definition: resembling paste in color, (usually used in the plural) one of a pair of adhesive patches worn to cover the nipples of exotic dancers and striptease performers
details:
adjective
- resembling paste in color
= synonyms: pastelike
- having the sticky properties of an adhesive
= synonyms: sticky
noun
- (usually used in the plural) one of a pair of adhesive patches worn to cover the nipples of exotic dancers and striptease performers
- small meat pie or turnover
